entry.title: Matchless Flannel Airway Buffing Wheel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Matchless
Type: Metal Polish
Price: 24.25

For the finest finish achievable with a cotton airway wheel.

Ultra soft Domet flannel Airway buff for colour buffing and final finishing. This material results in a buff that is extremely soft but with good body. The bias construction minimizes fraying and runs cooler than the same material made in loose full disc form. 

 

  • Buff will need to be raked prior to initial use.
  • Does not include a centre reducer plate.
  • Requires the use of a self-centring safety flange set or standard end flanges (ideally) in conjunction with a centre reducer plate for proper mounting and safe operation.
  • Industrial grade
  • Max RPM: 3200 RPM
  • 16 ply
  • Density: #4 (Heavy Duty)
  • Dimensions: 25 x 25 x 2 cm

entry.title: Matchless White Checker Plate Airway Buffing Wheel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Matchless
Type: Buffing Wheel
Price: 24.25

Excellent choice for finishing diamond plate, step grate, and other narrow or recessed areas like between rear wheel lug nuts.

A standard soft and flexible airway buff for color buffing and final finishing. High density cloth sewn at a 3/8″ concentric stitch. 

  • Buff will need to be raked prior to initial use.
  • Does not include a centre reducer plate.
  • Requires the use of a self-centring safety flange set or standard end flanges (ideally) in conjunction with a centre reducer plate for proper mounting and safe operation.
  • Industrial grade
  • Max RPM: 3400 RPM
  • 16 ply
  • Density: #4 (Heavy Duty)
  • Dimensions: 25 x 25 x 1.5 cm

entry.title: Matchless Yellow Checker Plate Buffing Wheel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Matchless
Type: Buffing Wheel
Price: 24.25

Excellent choice for finishing diamond plate, step grate, and other narrow or recessed areas like between rear wheel lug nuts.

Firmer than untreated cloth but less stiff than purple, orange, and blue airways, mill-treated yellow airways are recommended for use as a secondary colouring wheel providing extra clarity and depth in your end results. High density cloth sewn at a 3/8″ concentric stitch. 

  • Buff will need to be raked prior to initial use.
  • Does not include a centre reducer plate.
  • Requires the use of a self-centring safety flange set or standard end flanges (ideally) in conjunction with a centre reducer plate for proper mounting and safe operation.
  • Industrial grade
  • Max RPM: 3400 RPM
  • 12 ply
  • Density: #4 (Heavy Duty)
  • Dimensions: 25 x 25 x 1.5 cm

entry.title: Matchless Yellow Airway Buffing Wheel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Matchless
Type: Buffing Wheel
Price: 22.75 - 26.00 (2 variants)

Provides a medium-firm buff for light cutting and colour buffing.

Firmer than untreated cloth and flannel but less stiff than purple, orange, and blue airways, mill-treated yellow airways are recommended for use as a secondary colouring wheel providing extra clarity and depth in your end results. 

  • Buff will need to be raked prior to initial use.
  • Does not include a centre reducer plate.
  • Requires the use of a self-centring safety flange set or standard end flanges (ideally) in conjunction with a centre reducer plate for proper mounting and safe operation.
  • Industrial grade
  • Max RPM: 12" x 5" = 3200 RPM; 10" x 3" = 3450 RPM
  • 16 ply
  • Density: #4 (Heavy Duty), #2 (Standard Duty)
  • Dimensions: 25.5 x 25.5 x 2 cm

entry.title: Matchless Blue Airway Buffing Wheel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Matchless
Type: Buffing Wheel
Price: 22.75 - 26.00 (2 variants)

Provides a firm buff for cut and colour buffing.

Matchless's middle-of-the-road cut buff – less stiff than purple and orange, but more stiff than yellow, untreated, and flannel wheels – mill-treated blue airways are recommended for use as a secondary cut and primary colour buff. 

  • Buff will need to be raked prior to initial use.
  • Does not include a centre reducer plate.
  • Requires the use of a self-centring safety flange set or standard end flanges (ideally) in conjunction with a centre reducer plate for proper mounting and safe operation.
  • Industrial grade
  • Max RPM: 3200 RPM
  • 16 ply
  • Density: #4 (Heavy Duty)
  • Dimensions: 25.5 x 25.5 x 2 cm
  • Max RPM: 10″ x 3″ = 3200 RPM; 12″ x 5″ = 2800 RPM

entry.title: Matchless Orange/Yellow Layered Airway Buffing Wheel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Matchless Airway Wheel
Type: Metal Polish
Price: 26.00

A firm, primary cut airway buff that will still flex slightly on uneven surfaces.

Matchless's second stiffest mill-treated airway, the orange buff is best suited as a primary cutting wheel. With ten plies of stiff orange cloth combined with ten plies of softer yellow cloth, this airway offers sustained cutting power with extra flexibility and durability compared to a standard 16 ply airway.

  • Buff will need to be raked prior to initial use.
  • Does not include a centre reducer plate.
  • Requires the use of a self-centring safety flange set or standard end flanges (ideally) in conjunction with a centre reducer plate for proper mounting and safe operation.
  • Industrial grade
  • Max RPM: 3400 RPM
  • 20 ply
  • Density: #2 (Standard Duty)
  • Dimensions: 25 x 25 x 2 cm

entry.title: Matchless Purple Airway Buffing Wheel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Matchless
Type: Buffing Wheel
Price: 24.25

The stiffest buff for a heavy, fast cut.

To make quick work of metal in the worst condition, we present Matchless's mill-treated purple airway. More aggressive than any other cotton airway, this buff is the best choice for heavy cut-down operations. 

  • Buff will need to be raked prior to initial use.
  • Does not include a centre reducer plate.
  • Requires the use of a self-centring safety flange set or standard end flanges (ideally) in conjunction with a centre reducer plate for proper mounting and safe operation.
  • Industrial grade
  • Max RPM: 3400 RPM
  • 16 ply
  • Density: #4 (Heavy Duty)
  • Dimensions: 25 x 25 x 2 cm

entry.title: Matchless Medium Dip-Treated Sisal Buffing Wheel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Matchless Airway Wheel
Type: Metal Polish
Price: 32.99

Industrial grade medium treated open face sisal buff for use in heavy cut down operations on stainless steel.

Open face sisal buffs feature a pleated design that allows for cooler operation and increased flexibility than full disc sisal wheels; they also provide some oscillation on the face to help prevent rippling and streaking. Medium firmness dip treatment adds to cut aggressiveness and buff life. 

  • Buff will need to be raked prior to initial use.
  • Does not include a centre reducer plate.
  • Requires the use of a self-centring safety flange set or standard end flanges (ideally) in conjunction with a centre reducer plate for proper mounting and safe operation.
  • Industrial grade
  • Max RPM: 3200 RPM
  • Dimensions: 25 x 25 x 4.5 cm

entry.title: Matchless Non-Woven Buffing Wheel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Matchless
Type: Metal Polish
Price: 34.75 - 46.75 (2 variants)

For blending and satin finishing on flat or contoured metal parts.

Very fine (~320 grit) aluminum oxide non-woven material. Four-ply airway buff is less aggressive than full disc wheels. Can be used to produce decorative finishes. Recommended for cleaning up welds and in areas where conventional sanders cannot reach (e.g., rim water channels) prior to polishing.

  • Buff will need to be raked prior to initial use.
  • Does not include a centre reducer plate.
  • Requires the use of a self-centring safety flange set or standard end flanges (ideally) in conjunction with a centre reducer plate for proper mounting and safe operation.
  • Industrial grade
  • Max RPM: 1000 RPM
  • 4 ply
  • Dimensions: 25.5 x 25.5 x 5 cm
